text: KhK Vympel () is a Russian bandy club based in Korolyov, Moscow Oblast, founded in 1934. The club colours are white, red and blue. In 1963 it won the bronze in the Soviet national championship. Their stadium, called Stadium Vympel, was expecting artificial ice,https://translate.google.co.uk/translate?hl=en&sl;=ru&u;=http://www.rusbandy.ru/news/8922/ However, the project was abandoned. Although an indoor ice hockey-sized arena entered the plans instead, the official reason given was financial problems.https://translate.google.co.uk/translate?hl=sv&sl;=ru&u;=http://www.rusbandy.ru/news/9285/ ==External links== *Official homepage *Team image ==References== Category:Bandy clubs in Russia Category:Bandy clubs in the Soviet Union Category:Bandy clubs established in 1934
title: Vympel Korolyov
